Tous nos chauffeurs sont certifiés par l: All of our drivers are certified by law.  no.  2010-1223 which took effect April 1st, 2011, regarding the transportation of passengers with a driver.  Our drivers have a minimum of 5 years experience with a licensed motor cycle, and 2 years experience with a moto-taxi.  All our drivers carry professional ID cards given by the police.  The drivers carry professional insurance and a sticker on the windshield saying they are authorized to transport passengers on two or three wheels.  You can ask the driver to see any of this information anytime.
Votre confort est une de nos priorités,: Your comfort is one of our top priorities.  This is why PREST'BIKE moto-taxi offers a range of comforts for you, to make your trip easy and secure. (helmets, protective pants, gloves, blue tooth, inter-com, jackets equipped with elbow, shoulder, and back padding, heated vest, and airbag vest).  All of our equipment is approved by the Government.
